FuncDef: The issu reset connect-timer command configures the device connection timeout period.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the device connection timeout period.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 90, in minutes. If the value is 0, no device connection timeout period is configured.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a device connection timeout period, run the issu reset connect-timer command. If the master/slave control board switchover has been completed during an ISSU, but the device has not been logged in to within the specified connection timeout period, the system automatically rolls back to the pre-upgrade state.
Before performing a master/slave control board switchover, you can run this command to modify the device connection timeout period.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
